entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle this evening. Wind west 30 km/h becoming north 20 early this evening then light before morning. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023
